survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Subscription-Based Meal Kits
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with subscription-based meal kit services, focusing on satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with single-choice radio buttons for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with the delivery of your meal kits (e.g., late delivery, missing items)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for consistency.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with the delivery of your meal kits (e.g., late delivery, missing items)?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 options to prioritize responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a maximum of 3 selections and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the recipes provided with your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for consistency.

script.question_text: How often do you use the recipes provided with your meal kits?

questions.question_text: Do you have any dietary restrictions or preferences that your meal kit service accommodates?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button followed by an optional open-text field if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with conditional open-text for 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Do you have any dietary restrictions or preferences that your meal kit service accommodates?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please specify your dietary restrictions or preferences.
questions.client_notes: This question should only appear if Q10 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text (OPEN_TEXT) with conditional routing.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please specify your dietary restrictions or preferences.
